title: Magical Pumpkin Seed
summaries: The Magical Pumpkin Seed summons a pet Squashling. It is obtained from harvesting fully-grown Pumpkins during Halloween, which has a 0.5*1/200 (0.5%) chance a Magical Pumpkin Seed to drop. When the player jumps high enough or outruns the Squashling, it will twirl and fly after the player.

statistics.Sell: 2
